## Checklist
<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code builds successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Code follows project style and conventions
- [ ] TypeScript types are correct (no `any` types without justification)
- [ ] No commented-out code or debug statements left behind

### Testing & Validation
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm run test` if applicable)
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Edge cases considered
- [ ] Changes work across different browsers/devices (if applicable)

### Documentation & Accessibility
- [ ] README or documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Accessibility requirements met (WCAG 2.1 level AA for UI changes)
- [ ] Environment variables documented (if new ones added)

### Security & Performance
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No sensitive data (keys, passwords, tokens) in the code
- [ ] Performance implications considered
- [ ] Database queries optimized (if applicable)

### Process
- [ ] Branch created from `main` with proper naming convention
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] Reviewed by at least one teammate
- [ ] Approved by code reviewer(s)
